feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 8:38 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 8:38 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
